Verify Rooms dropdown is visible and clickable
Verify user can increase rooms using '+' button
Expected Output: Number of rooms increments by 1 per click

Test Case Description: Verify user can decrease rooms using '-' button
Expected Output: Number of rooms decreases by 1, min value = 1

Test Case Description: Verify Rooms cannot be decreased below 1
Expected Output: Rooms count remains 1, button disabled or no change

Test Case Description: Verify Adults dropdown is visible and clickable
Verify '+' button increases adults
Expected Output: Adults count increases by 1 per click, max limit respected

Test Case Description: Verify '-' button decreases adults
Expected Output: Adults count decreases by 1 per click, min = 1

Test Case Description: Verify Adults cannot go below 1
Expected Output: Adults count remains 1, button disabled or no change

Test Case Description: Verify Children dropdown is visible and clickable
Verify '+' button increases children
Expected Output: Children count increases by 1 per click

Test Case Description: Verify '-' button decreases children
Expected Output: Children count decreases by 1 per click, min = 0

Test Case Description: Verify Children cannot go below 0
Expected Output: Children count remains 0, button disabled or no change

Test Case Description: Verify Search button is visible and enabled
Expected Output: Search button is visible and enabled

Test Case Description: Click Search button without filling mandatory fields
Steps: Click Search button without entering any data

Test Case Description: Perform search with all valid inputs
Pre-Conditions: Hotel/Flight tab open, valid inputs entered
Steps: Fill all required fields → Click Search button
Expected Output: Search results page loads with relevant results

Test Case Description: Perform search with invalid date selection
Pre-Conditions: Hotel/Flight tab open, invalid date inputs
Steps: Enter invalid dates (e.g., check-out before check-in) → Click Search
Expected Output: Error message or no search results displayed

Test Case Description: Verify Search button disables to prevent multiple clicks

Expected Output: Button disables after first click until results load

Test Case Description: Verify loading indicator appears on clicking Search
Expected Output: Loading spinner or progress indicator shown
